name: Staffs N Furious
description:
Race around Staffs Campus and beat your opponents to class! Find shortcuts and speedboosts but avoid trash containers and mud to get there first!

The game features 4 player splitscreen and is compatible with keyboard and controllers. Press ENTER on a keyboard or START on a controller to join the race.

Very early bid submitted for Freshers Jam 2022. Submitted by team ARCELM, group 53.
